recipe.name: Hurricane
recipe.ingredients:
• 1 oz light rum
  • 1 oz dark rum
  • 1/2 oz overproof rum
  • 1 oz passionfruit syrup
  • juice of half a lemon (~1 oz)
  • 1/2 oz grenadine
recipe.instructions:
1. Chill a medium tulip, wine glass, or, if you have one, hurricane glass.
  2. Combine ingredients in shaking tins and shake vigorously for 10-15 seconds.
  3. Fill glass with ice and strain contents into glass. Serve.
recipe.notes: makes a fruity, fairly strong rendition somewhere between original recipes and modern, premixed ones
